settings.title: Terms & Conditions of McDonalds UK Promotion 2023
settings.description_col_1: *To access this offer, please enter your McDonalds coupon code at checkout to receive 20% off selected products advertised on https://uk.hyperx.com/collections/mcd23. The coupon code will expire on 30/11/2023 at 23.59 GMT. Single use per customer, selected products only. Available whilst stocks last. Requires acceptance of Terms and conditions of Sales and Service. Purchases made using voucher code must be for personal use and not for resale. Each coupon code is unique, non-exchangeable, non-transferable and no cash alternative is offered, except as required by law. This coupon code cannot be used in conjunction with any other coupon code. HP is not responsible for lost or stolen coupon code. HP reserves the right, acting reasonably and in accordance with all relevant legislation and codes of practice to change or cancel this offer at any time.
